newsitem.title: USA: WMX Technologies Q4 loss vs profit.
newsitem.headline: WMX Technologies Q4 loss vs profit.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE: 1996 Q4 includes $0.18 per share charge for recognition by the company's Waste Management International unit of provision for loss and taxes related to sale of its investment in Wassex Water Plc. It also includes $0.26 per share charge to revalue investments in France, Austria and Spain in contemplation of exiting all or part of these markets.

The company's Waste Management Inc and Chemical Waste Management Inc units recorded charges for restructuring their finance and administrative functions and increasing reserves for certain litigation, including the previously reported dispute involving the Emelle, Alabama, hazardous waste landfill, which the company said will be appealed. These charges amounted to $0.34 per share.
Q4 1996 net from continuing operations was a loss of $160 million or $0.33 per share vs profit of $103 million or $0.21 per share.
Full company name is WMX Technologies Inc.
